get.description:
Possible sort parameters:

criticity (string)
name (string)
count_open_tickets (string)
service_spec_name (string)
location (string)
client_name (string)
contact_name (string)
contact_phone (string)
contact_email (string)

Possible sort values:

"DESC" (DESCENDANT)|"ASC" (ASCENDANT)

Possible filter parameters:

criticity (list of strings)
name (string)
count_open_tickets (boolean)
service_spec_name (string)
location (string)
client_name (string)
contact_name (string)
contact_phone (string)
contact_email (string)

parameters.name: allInstances
parameters.description: Flag to get all instances (enabled/disabled). (Default value: false)

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: Flag to get the exact name instance. (Default value: false)
